body_html: Just got bit by this issue as well. Thank $DEITY for Google search, the error spew is impenetrable. The fix for me was simply to change the usual init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer() to init_op = tf.group(tf.global_variables_initializer(), tf.local_variables_initializer()), and run it when the Session is up.

body: Just got bit by this issue as well. Thank $DEITY for Google search, the error spew is impenetrable. The fix for me was simply to change the usual `init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer()` to `init_op = tf.group(tf.global_variables_initializer(), tf.local_variables_initializer())`, and run it when the Session is up.
